snippet.title: I made a Speedrunning Game with Intentional Bugs
snippet.description:
I love watching speedruns so I made my own speedrunning game where you need to use bugs to get to the goal as fast as possible. Have fun :)

Download the speedrunning game here: https://aalexdoesstuff.itch.io/fast-as-duck
Wishlist my other game Chaos Cities: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1868580/City_Worlds/

| Links |
Discord: https://discord.gg/58bckpHz4g
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/aalexdoesstuff

| Speed runs  shown in the video |
Mario 64 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zLphAlLQNiE
Zelda Botw - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tvVG0_0jzjk
Half Life 2 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fpFcJDIXLGI
Zelda Totk - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=376yjeb9ImY
Super Mario World - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jf9i7MjViCE
Portal - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SCrfnfMe9F4
Zelda: Twilight Princess - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEB6e9mal1o


| About my game |
I want to create a fun city builder that is inspired by games like cities:skylines but focuses on fun crazy stuff, like full freedom over taxes, coal plants that fill the city full of smog or a financial divide between city worlds and much more.

| About me |
I am a 22ish year old electrical engineer in my masters working on my city building game. I accidentally got a part time game dev job a few years ago and have loved making games ever since. So here I am doing devlogs from time to time and maybe something other spicy in between. 


#speedrun #game
